title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 860/90 of 2 April 1990 amending the list annexed to Regulation (EEC) No 55/87 establishing the list of vessels exceeding eight metres length overall permitted to use beam trawls within certain areas of the Community
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 860/90
of 2 April 1990
amending the list annexed to Regulation (EEC) No 55/87 establishing the list of vessels exceeding eight metres length overall permitted to use beam trawls within certain areas of the Community
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 55/87 is amended as indicated in the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 April 1990.
For the Commission
Manuel MARĂN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 288, 11. 10. 1986, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 389, 30. 12. 1989, p. 75.
(3) OJ No L 8, 10. 1. 1987, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 46, 22. 2. 1990, p. 7.
ANNEX
The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 55/87 is amended as follows:
Vessels to be replaced:
